title: Vajira Lasantha
text: Sharing my interests, work and thoughts.

title: Vajira Lasantha
text: I am a PhD candidate at Stockholm Resilience Centre. My current research focuses on global green water resilience.

title: Vajira Lasantha
text:
Education
United Nations University Institute for Advanced Study of Sustainability (UNU-IAS) Tokyo, Japan MSc Sustainability Sep 2021 - Aug 2023
The University of Tokyo Tokyo, Japan MEng Urban Environmental Engineering Sep 2020 - Aug 2022
University of Moratuwa Katubedda, Sri Lanka BSc Civil Engineering May 2013 - Apr 2017

title: Vajira Lasantha
text:

Ceywater Consultants (pvt) Ltd, Sri Lanka Engineer Sep 2017 - Jan 2019
